mapper.select: select b.days as days,count(1) as sum from (SELECT DATE_FORMAT( `create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS days, COUNT( 1 ) AS num FROM tb_pipel_log where msg like concat('%', #{result}, '%') and pipel_id=#{pipelId} and create_time >= DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL #{lookday} DAY ) and del_flag=1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ,pipel_trace_id ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT( `create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) DESC) b GROUP BY b.days;
